debug.copy_location.help: %1$s + C = Copy location as /tp command, hold %1$s + C to crash the game
debug.crash.message: %1$s + C is held down. This will crash the game unless released.
debug.creative_spectator.error: Unable to switch gamemode; no permission
debug.inspect.help: %1$s + I = Copy entity or block data to clipboard
debug.pause.help: %1$s + Esc = Pause without pause menu (if pausing is possible)
debug.profiling.start: Profiling started for %2$s seconds. Use %1$s + L to stop early
